title: Facebook addresses severe battery drain issue with updated iOS app
text:
Facebook addresses severe battery drain issue with updated iOS app 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
Responding to recent complaints that its iOS app excessively drains iPhone battery life, Facebook on Thursday pushed out a partial fix, expl...
